nodes.text: Shol'Arma was a commentator on Gundark's Gear Datalog during the early years of the New Republic. Shol'Arma commented on the entry for the Leviathan Power Armor, stating that unless the wearer was a Mon Calamari, they would have trouble wearing it. To counter that, Shol'Arma suggested having an astromech droid record the wearer swimming so they could map the movements into the Leviathan's motion control programming.
